description: A deployable architecture for 'vibe coding' single-page apps: paste or upload your index.html and get an instant IBM COS-hosted sample app.

inputs: Your IBM Cloud API key — needed to authenticate Terraform. Don't worry, it's safe!
IBM Cloud region where resources will be created.
The CRN of your IBM Cloud Object Storage instance.
Name of the bucket where the sample app HTML will be uploaded.
Whether to make the bucket publicly accessible.
HTML content for your sample app. Defaults to the included sample-app-index.html file.
